review_id: Neat local shop! Had a delicious pour over and purchased some chocolate to enjoy and share. The Bloc edible coffee is so much like a chocolate bar, could easily munch my way to caffeine jitters.  Everything is made in house, and I had a nice time talking with the staff to learn more about all Maps offers. Worth a visit!
review_text: Neat local shop! Had a delicious pour over and purchased some chocolate to enjoy and share. The Bloc edible coffee is so much like a chocolate bar, could easily munch my way to caffeine jitters.  Everything is made in house, and I had a nice time talking with the staff to learn more about all Maps offers. Worth a visit!

review_id:
We were recommended to come here by a friend and I can see why.
It was an amazing experience with an owner that is very present in the business. You can feel the love in the building with their energy and taste it in what they produce.

They sell coffee and chocolate (as is in their name).
The chocolates have samples that are help yourself.

They have a BBQ pop up that comes out I believe on the weekends. I didn't attend that, but was told.

The people who work there are happy to talk to you about their products.
I spent most of my time walking around looking for things to buy so I didn't test out the seating.

As the coffee is roasted there, they can sometimes do custom roasts. I'm not sure as to the requirement involved for that to happen but I was shown some roasts that were special for specific clients.

Parking is available in a shared medium sized lot.

response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the visit!!! We appreciate the kind words! vr

review_id: After going to Arthur Murray dance school we dropped by Maps. We got the Mexican mocha. I cannot wait to come back to this place! We tried a few different chocolates, enjoyed the incredible mocha!  We looked around at all products they had available. We're going to come back for the one hour chocolate making class. Next time we'll get two coffee's and some chocolate or a pastry. We were in a rush this time and were not anything more than one shared mocha. I definitely recommend this place to go solo or with your significant other. It's romantic and very VERY friendly. Awesome service.
review_text: After going to Arthur Murray dance school we dropped by Maps. We got the Mexican mocha. I cannot wait to come back to this place! We tried a few different chocolates, enjoyed the incredible mocha!  We looked around at all products they had available. We're going to come back for the one hour chocolate making class. Next time we'll get two coffee's and some chocolate or a pastry. We were in a rush this time and were not anything more than one shared mocha. I definitely recommend this place to go solo or with your significant other. It's romantic and very VERY friendly. Awesome service.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks Tom for visiting and thank you for the raving review! See you soon.

review_id: They roast the beans in the back, I'll definately be ordering their beans online. The edible coffee is a must try. Such a cool place and comforting environment!
review_text: They roast the beans in the back, I'll definately be ordering their beans online. The edible coffee is a must try. Such a cool place and comforting environment!
response_from_owner_text: Thank you Audrey, 9 years ago when this space was a bicycle shop many people thought I had lost my mind when I put such a big roaster on the floor. Now it's very much a symbol of who we are, cool people making cool things that we love. There is no man behind the curtain and anyone can see us roast coffee and make chocolate. I wanted to make sure our customers understand we are crafts persons making great products. Bloc as you mention is a creation of mine from about 4 years ago, Coffee you can Eat! We love it and we are glad you like it too. Thanks again for the review. vr

review_id: For what they lack in atmosphere and environment, they make up for in chocolate and coffee. This isn't a coffee shop, so don't come here expecting a place to do work. It's primarily a coffee roaster and chocolate maker's shop for you to grab coffee, beans, or chocolate, so if you adjust your expectations to that, you'll be ok. I really enjoy their unique chocolate flavors - London fog was personally a favorite! It's awesome that they provide chocolate samples for you to try before purchasing.
review_text: For what they lack in atmosphere and environment, they make up for in chocolate and coffee. This isn't a coffee shop, so don't come here expecting a place to do work. It's primarily a coffee roaster and chocolate maker's shop for you to grab coffee, beans, or chocolate, so if you adjust your expectations to that, you'll be ok. I really enjoy their unique chocolate flavors - London fog was personally a favorite! It's awesome that they provide chocolate samples for you to try before purchasing.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the visit and feedback! We strive on making the best coffee and chocolate in KC We appreciate your kind words about the chocolate. As chocolate makers we like to create unique and interesting recipes. See you soon! vr

review_id: Had a blast hanging out with Vincent and learning more about him and his business. Chocolate was delicious, I don't drink coffee but I was incredibly tempted to do so! Would highly recommend Maps for any coffee/chocolate related needs.
review_text: Had a blast hanging out with Vincent and learning more about him and his business. Chocolate was delicious, I don't drink coffee but I was incredibly tempted to do so! Would highly recommend Maps for any coffee/chocolate related needs.
response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review Garrett. Vincent loves to chat about coffee and chocolate - glad you had a great time too!

review_id: Delicious mocha and Mexican mochas! Lots of chocolate samples available in shop. I highly recommend their coffee bite and London fog. Friendly service, but not a lot of seating options for groups larger than 4.
review_text: Delicious mocha and Mexican mochas! Lots of chocolate samples available in shop. I highly recommend their coffee bite and London fog. Friendly service, but not a lot of seating options for groups larger than 4.
response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the visit! Yes we are a small shop and struggle trying to find more seating in our small retail area. We're working on it! thank you for the review, vr

review_id: How generous and educational! There are free sample of chocolates and coffee. Chocolate with chili is bit spicy, of course, and it perfect small gift for my Mexican American husband for Father's Day, since he likes spice covered candy. Sample coffee from Honduras was good. Honey lavender cafe I ordered soothed my monkeys in my mind. Go there to train your taste buds, look at world map or relax.

response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review and the visit! I am glad to hear you loved what we have to offer. We appreciate the visit and look forward to thew next time you are in. Cheers! vr
